data.lyric:
[ti:Bing Crosby / White Christmas]
[ar:Bing Crosby]
[al:Absolute Christmas]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:01.05]Bing Crosby / White Christmas - Bing Crosby
[00:10.77]I'm dreaming of a white Christmas
[00:21.90]Just like the ones I used to know
[00:30.51]Where the treetops glisten and children listen
[00:41.18]To hear sleigh bells in the snow
[00:51.66]I'm dreaming of a white Christmas
[01:03.09]With every Christmas card I write
[01:10.04]"May your days be merry and bright
[01:22.13]And may all your Christmases be white"
[01:34.00]I'm dreaming of a white Christmas
[01:44.55]Just like the ones I used to know
[01:52.81]Where the treetops glisten and children listen
[02:03.44]To hear sleigh bells in the snow
[02:13.97]I'm dreaming of a white Christmas
[02:24.34]With every Christmas card I write
[02:31.38]"May your days be merry and bright
[02:44.78]And may all your Christmases be white"
data.trans:
[ti:Bing Crosby / White Christmas]
[ar:Bing Crosby]
[al:Absolute Christmas]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:01.05]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:10.77]我梦想着过一个白色的圣诞节
[00:21.90]就像我曾熟悉的那样
[00:30.51]树梢上的灯闪烁着 孩子们聆听着
[00:41.18]奔跑在雪地上的雪橇的铃铛声
[00:51.66]我梦想着过一个白色的圣诞节
[01:03.09]我会亲手写下每一封圣诞卡片
[01:10.04]祝愿你们快乐开怀
[01:22.13]希望你们那里的圣诞节会下起雪
[01:34.00]我梦想着过一个白色的圣诞节
[01:44.55]就像我曾熟悉的那样
[01:52.81]树梢上的灯闪烁着 孩子们聆听着
[02:03.44]奔跑在雪地上的雪橇的铃铛声
[02:13.97]我梦想着过一个白色的圣诞节
[02:24.34]我会亲手写下每一封圣诞卡片
[02:31.38]祝愿你们快乐开怀
[02:44.78]希望你们那里的圣诞节会下起雪
